NI Committee deeply sceptical about tech solutions, but says CU and SM solves the problem in transition.</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great news folks! We are all set to open for the new and extended 2018 season on Good Friday (March 30). Online bookings will open on Friday, March 23

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">David Davis revealed today he hasnt visited the Irish border for 20 years.<a href="https://t.co/mebFceCWAu" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pique_92/status/974230731986751488" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pique_92/status/974230731986751488"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pique_92/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/974230731986751488</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">David Davis declines <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="485146783"><s>@</s><b>karinsmyth</b></span> and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20856796"><s>@</s><b>JennyChapman</b></span> offer to visit Irish border, citing a previous visit before he was appointed Secretary of State.   <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This Guardian Editorial is absolutely right on Russia - and the resolute, united strength we need to demonstrate in our response.<a href="https://t.co/5lO9oIcojx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/mar/14/the-guardian-view-on-theresa-may-and-russia-tackling-the-troll-state?CMP=share_btn_tw" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/mar/14/the-guardian-view-on-theresa-may-and-russia-tackling-the-troll-state?CMP=share_btn_tw"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/commentisfree/</span><span class="invisible">2018/mar/14/the-guardian-view-on-theresa-may-and-russia-tackling-the-troll-state?CMP=share_btn_tw</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour Shadow Defence Secretary backs Russian expulsions and robust action against the Kremlin in first major interview since poisoning

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Modern Russia should be the epitome of all that the left deplore.
It is effectively a gangster state run by an unpleasant oligarchy of exploitative capitalists who have trampled on free speech and human rights.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Finally, the proposal would require an EU Border around Ireland or else goods from Leeds could land in Larne, cross the Border at Newry and out through Rosslare to EU (and the same in reverse meaning the potential need for a UK Border between NI and GB)</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So, if adopted, all NI firms engaged in exporting to Ireland and on into the EU should sell off, sub-contract or reduce size to get under the 250 threshold. Irish firms selling into NI and GB would do the same.</p>
</div>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Owen Smith Retweeted The Independent</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This cannot possibly be a plan being seriously considered by the Government.   <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="972525932400533504" data-item-id="972525932400533504" data-permalink-path="/OwenSmith_MP/status/972525932400533504" data-conversation-id="972525932400533504" data-tweet-nonce="972525932400533504-6e9ec8a8-5159-4336-b1b8-4423f606de14" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="OwenSmith_MP" data-name="Owen Smith" data-user-id="388299335" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;388299335&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;OwenSmith_MP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/OwenSmith_MP" data-user-id="388299335">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/798535250469076992/UTqZfkF3_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Robert Peston Retweeted Gavin Williamson MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I always think there is something slightly surreal about powerful members of the Conservative cabinet asking voters to sign a petition criticising a Tory county council. It is almost as though they see no link between government funding and local government services!<a href="https://t.co/mQHBsm9VKy" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GavinWilliamso</span><span class="invisible">n/status/971430148565356544</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Robert Peston added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544" data-conversation-id="971430148565356544" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="971430148565356544" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="GavinWilliamson" data-user-id="368314502" href="/GavinWilliamson/status/971430148565356544" data-conversation-id="971430148565356544" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Gavin Williamson MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>GavinWilliamson</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Concerned that Staffordshire County Council will no longer be supporting a number of bus services in <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SouthStaffordshire</b></span>. I have created a petition in response to this which I encourage you to sign.

</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I fully accept that money, contractual obligations &amp; self interest precludes a return to the days before super-club control, the end of promotion and relegation &amp; meaningful matches every weekend. But dont tell me what weve got is good, or better. The emperor has no clothes 3/3</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The recent success (&amp; great play!) of the Scarlets, the former success of Wales, Judgement Day crowds, Ospreys efforts at outreach - none of these = success for the concept of regionalism. Nor does the bogus there was no alternative argument hold any water. 2/3</p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At risk of further exercising Regional fans, my often stated view is that Regional Rugby was an unnecessary mistake &amp; has failed. Financially fragile, unloved by a majority, little watched on TV or terrace, producing too few players for Wales &amp; divorced from the grassroots 1/3</p>

    <div class="dropdown">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Tom Blenkinsop Retweeted Community union</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Communitys General Secretary, <a href="/Roy_Rickhuss" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1631211493"><s>@</s><b>Roy_Rickhuss</b></a> has led calls for International Trade Secretary, Liam Fox to use all leverage necessary to ensure the UK is exempt from any 25% Trump tariffs.

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="970761540067618822" data-item-id="970761540067618822" data-permalink-path="/darrenpjones/status/970761540067618822" data-conversation-id="970761540067618822" data-tweet-nonce="970761540067618822-72298f02-6b54-4511-a869-8e327a5d1b07" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="970952298649325569" data-retweeter="OwenSmith_MP" data-screen-name="darrenpjones" data-name="Darren Jones MP" data-user-id="20392734" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;20392734&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;darrenpjones&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Darren Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Darren Jones MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Darren Jones MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;388299335&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;OwenSmith_MP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This is deeply worrying. Airbus in North Bristol at risk from a Hard Brexit. That's thousands of jobs directly and in the supply chain at risk from this Governments <a href="/hashtag/BrexitShambles?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BrexitShambles</b></a>. Unacceptable.<a href="https://t.co/adzDCLUCfC" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://amp.theguardian.com/business/2018/mar/05/airbus-may-leave-uk-unless-there-is-urgent-clarity-on-brexit-trade?CMP=share_btn_tw&amp;__twitter_impression=true" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://amp.theguardian.com/business/2018/mar/05/airbus-may-leave-uk-unless-there-is-urgent-clarity-on-brexit-trade?CMP=share_btn_tw&amp;__twitter_impression=true"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">amp.theguardian.com/business/2018/</span><span class="invisible">mar/05/airbus-may-leave-uk-unless-there-is-urgent-clarity-on-brexit-trade?CMP=share_btn_tw&amp;__twitter_impression=true</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">If this is true, its completely out of order and I will absolutely call for reimbursement- however, I gather the Health Boards state that its not true....I will find out. Thanks for volunteering!<a href="https://t.co/rmYP8PAzbP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/andygwilym/status/969926489453064192" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/andygwilym/status/969926489453064192"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/andygwilym/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/969926489453064192</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="969856174601449473" id="stream-item-tweet-969856174601449473" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;969856174601449473&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">South Wales Police Retweeted South Wales Police</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4"><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/26a0.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Warning sign" aria-label="Emoji: Warning sign" /> Please bear in mind that conditions on the roads are still treacherous in large parts of South Wales this morning, and Met Office severe weather warnings remain in place.

We would urge you to take notice of our advice issued yesterday:<a href="https://t.co/M6emhop1mT" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/swpolice/status/969565033142407171" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/swpolice/status/969565033142407171"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/swpolice/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/969565033142407171</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">South Wales Police added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Roy Rickhuss Retweeted Community union</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is a massive issue for our members in the steel industry - we cant allow Donald Trump to threaten the jobs of UK steelworkers. Please sign up here and share.<a href="https://t.co/vBrL5rPu7l" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/communityunion/status/969568170167152640" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/communityunion/status/969568170167152640"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/communityunion</span><span class="invisible">/status/969568170167152640</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Steel is a global industry, and Donald Trumps actions could have a profound effect on British steelworkers. Our General Secretary responds to the news, and steps up to lead the fight to ensure the UK is exempt. <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f4aa.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flexed biceps" aria-label="Emoji: Flexed biceps" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2699.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Gear" aria-label="Emoji: Gear" /><img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f447.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Hand from back with index finger pointing down" aria-label="Emoji: Hand from back with index finger pointing down" /><a href="https://t.co/nNByKi18lr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/roy_rickhuss/status/969489119045971968" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/roy_rickhuss/status/969489119045971968"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/roy_rickhuss/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/969489119045971968</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Community union added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Roy_Rickhuss/status/969489119045971968" data-conversation-id="969489119045971968" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="969489119045971968" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Roy_Rickhuss" data-user-id="1631211493" href="/Roy_Rickhuss/status/969489119045971968" data-conversation-id="969489119045971968" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Roy Rickhuss</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Roy_Rickhuss</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">The new US steel tariffs are deeply worrying for the UK steel industry. Donald Trump is putting jobs at risk on both sides of the Atlantic. Thousands of steelworkers across the country voted for Brexit on the promise it would deliver a new era of international trade.</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Council will be treating all main roads as a priority for the next 24 hours. However, due to heavy snow fall predicted, we may experience difficulties in keeping all roads clear. We advise residents to plan ahead when making journeys today. Please park vehicles sensibly<a href="https://t.co/u1rQLuxsIu" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/u1rQLuxsIu</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="969468949363658752" data-item-id="969468949363658752" data-permalink-path="/OwenSmith_MP/status/969468949363658752" data-conversation-id="969468949363658752" data-tweet-nonce="969468949363658752-ff1f0356-9f6a-4cd5-853b-7d8928dfcf74" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="OwenSmith_MP" data-name="Owen Smith" data-user-id="388299335" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;388299335&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;OwenSmith_MP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Owen Smith&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/OwenSmith_MP" data-user-id="388299335">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/798535250469076992/UTqZfkF3_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Owen Smith</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>OwenSmith_MP</b></span></a>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">RCT Council</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>RCTCouncil</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  </div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Shadow Brexit Team Retweeted Faisal Islam</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Owen Smith Retweeted Faisal Islam</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">If true, then Johnson's recklessness with our relationship the Republic &amp; the future of the GFA must be addressed by the PM. This man's ego and his Brexit-at-any-cost strategy cannot be allowed to jeopardise peace. Mrs May should sack him before he does any more damage.<a href="https://t.co/fvzVSrEisG" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/faisalislam/status/968561482572206082" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/faisalislam/status/968561482572206082"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/faisalislam/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/968561482572206082</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Owen Smith added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">And though Johnson may be a joke, Im afraid there is nothing funny about his glib comparison between London borough borders and that in Ireland. Preserving an open border, without infrastructure, is a matter of the utmost importance - for peace and prosperity in Ireland.</p>

Last week the SDLP Leader met with <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a> to press that Labour build on its peace process legacy and act to protect the GFA.

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  </div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Important speech by <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a> today: Being in a Customs Union with the EU and maintaining a strong, ongoing relationship with the Single Market are both vital to preserve the Good Friday Agreement and to protect jobs &amp; rights in GB and Northern Ireland.</p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">BREAKING: Love Equality welcomes Northern Ireland equal marriage Private Member's Bill. We are happy to be working with <a href="/ConorMcGinn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="36158689"><s>@</s><b>ConorMcGinn</b></a> MP to prepare the Bill and build support across Parliament. <a href="https://t.co/kiTz3kq5vL" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.facebook.com/LoveEqualityNI/posts/2062191980465116" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.facebook.com/LoveEqualityNI/posts/2062191980465116"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">facebook.com/LoveEqualityNI</span><span class="invisible">/posts/2062191980465116</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/UhaHT05Ve0" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/UhaHT05Ve0</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This is an important intervention by the leader of <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> s sister party. </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Old news that there is to be an audit in England into <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a> though new and important announcement today that there will be a registry recording any and all use of <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a> in future - and a further review of Mesh by Baroness Cumberledge. Her remit will need to be scrutinised.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Fantastic, very welcome news that the Prime Minister has just announced a review into medical devices, including vaginal <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a>. Another victory for all those who have campaigned so hard, especially all <a href="/slingthemesh" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3302423943"><s>@</s><b>slingthemesh</b></a> &amp; <a href="/KathSansom" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="497553478"><s>@</s><b>KathSansom</b></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Matthew Pennycook MP Retweeted Sam Coates Times</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Worth reading the full text of ERGs letter. May sowed the wind with her Lancaster House speech, now she's reaping the whirlwind. Precisely why the sensible majority in Parliament that want a close future relationship with the EU must face these cavalier Brexiteers down.<a href="https://t.co/axyTwr31xj" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/966046024186974209" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes/status/966046024186974209"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/SamCoatesTimes</span><span class="invisible">/status/966046024186974209</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Matthew Pennycook MP added,</p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">So what does the letter from 62 Tory MPs mean? What do their demands amount to and how different is it from what the cabinet were likely to agree?</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Talking down Good Friday Agreement because it raises serious and genuine questions of those pursuing <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> is not only irresponsible but reckless and potentially undermines the foundations of a fragile peace process in Northern Ireland that should never be taken for granted</p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a> issue is global So many thousands of women maimed, so many being ignored, so many Governments hoping the issue will go away <a href="/OwenSmith_MP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="388299335"><s>@</s><b>OwenSmith_MP</b></a> <a href="/EmmaHardyMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="499590887"><s>@</s><b>EmmaHardyMP</b></a><a href="https://t.co/YyDBBmdUtl" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/la_patilla/status/936247665205137408" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/la_patilla/status/936247665205137408"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/la_patilla/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/936247665205137408</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <a href="/WalesForEurope/status/965372154463358981" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="3:47 pm - 18 Feb 2018" data-conversation-id="965372154463358981"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1518997632" data-time-ms="1518997632000" data-long-form="true">Feb 18</span></a>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Welcomed news that <a href="/teamponty" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2872218322"><s>@</s><b>teamponty</b></a> has backed our place in the EU <a href="/hashtag/SingleMarket?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SingleMarket</b></a>. Time for <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> to take note.

The people voted for the "exact same benefits" and deserve <a href="/hashtag/FullAndUnfettered?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>FullAndUnfettered</b></a> access.

<a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a><a href="https://t.co/w1CzMC6guL" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/w1CzMC6guL</a></p>
</div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">
    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-964074893464735744">

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">320</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Sling the Mesh</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>MeshCampaign</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">
  <a href="/MeshCampaign/status/963694376416235520" class="tweet-timestamp js-permalink js-nav js-tooltip" title="12:40 am - 14 Feb 2018" data-conversation-id="963694376416235520"><span class="_timestamp js-short-timestamp " data-aria-label-part="last" data-time="1518597618" data-time-ms="1518597618000" data-long-form="true">Feb 14</span></a>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Campaigners slam "new <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a>" which researchers say will replace "unacceptable" old one.
1 Its POLYeurethane = plastic
2 It adds oestrogen Study shows this 90% increases endometrial <a href="/hashtag/Cancer?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Cancer</b></a> risk
3. Groundhog day
<a href="/OwenSmith_MP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="388299335"><s>@</s><b>OwenSmith_MP</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/7ZqqlHu7hA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/3358913" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/3358913"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/3358913</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/2pgNbypg0p" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-5386803/Campaigners-slam-material-replace-vaginal-mesh.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.dailymail.co.uk/health/article-5386803/Campaigners-slam-material-replace-vaginal-mesh.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">dailymail.co.uk/health/article</span><span class="invisible">-5386803/Campaigners-slam-material-replace-vaginal-mesh.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Sling the Mesh Retweeted Harwich Standard</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Many thanks to your newspaper for covering this important <a href="/hashtag/womenshealth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>womenshealth</b></a> campaign warning others of the devastating risks of pelvic / vaginal <a href="/hashtag/mesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>mesh</b></a> implants  Knowledge is power <a href="/hashtag/SllingTheMesh?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SllingTheMesh</b></a> <a href="/EmmaHardyMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="499590887"><s>@</s><b>EmmaHardyMP</b></a> <a href="/OwenSmith_MP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="388299335"><s>@</s><b>OwenSmith_MP</b></a><a href="https://t.co/iTfPocipkW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HarwichStandard/status/963065159928328193" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HarwichStandard/status/963065159928328193"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HarwichStandar</span><span class="invisible">d/status/963065159928328193</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Sling the Mesh added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/HarwichStandard/status/963065159928328193" data-conversation-id="963065159928328193" aria-hidden="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In last 2 years the Govt. has spent 108 Million defending decisions to take money away from people with disabilities. What an appalling indictment of the benefits system - and of these Tories values system.</p>
</div>

  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
